iframe maps
format:
<iframe id="harta" width="100%" height="800px" frameborder="0" style="border:0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

<script>
(function(scope) {
    scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(url) {
        if (url && url.startsWith("http")) {
            document.getElementById("harta").src = url;
        }
    });
})(scope);
</script>

name: clean
prepare for gsheet
func:
let entries = flow.get("entries") || [];

msg.payload = entries.map(row => [
    row["Code"],
    row["Produs"],
    row["In/out"],
    row["Locatie"],
    row["Data"],
    row["Ora"],
    row["Comentarii"],
    row["Nr Comanda"]
]);

return msg;  // trimite doar ctre nodul de append la Sheet

format:
<textarea id="scanField" 
    placeholder="Scaneaza Codul Aici!" 
    style="
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        font-size: 16px;
        padding: 8px;
        margin: 0;
        border: 2px solid #000;
        border-radius: 4px;
        box-sizing: border-box;
        line-height: 1.4;
        resize: none;
        overflow: hidden;
        vertical-align: middle;
        appearance: none;
        -webkit-appearance: none;
        -moz-appearance: none;
    ">
</textarea>
<script>
    (function(scope) {
    let debounce;

    const sendLines = () => {
        const raw = document.getElementById("scanField").value;
        const lines = raw.split(/\r?\n/).map(l => l.trim()).filter(l => l);

        for (let line of lines) {
            scope.send({ payload: line });
        }

        document.getElementById("scanField").value = ""; //  Clean field
    };

    document.getElementById("scanField").addEventListener("keydown", function(e) {
        if (e.key === "Enter") {
            clearTimeout(debounce);
            debounce = setTimeout(() => {
                sendLines();
            }, 50);
        }
    });
})(scope);
</script>
